title: Italy : most-followed Italian fashion brands on Instagram 2018
yAxis: Number of Instagram followers in millions
summary: The Italy most-followed Brand in the fashion brands was Brand Prada , who made 21.0 Instagram .
The most most-followed Brand was Valentino , with just 4.4 Instagram .

In second place was Brand Dolce_&_Gabbana with 15.8 Instagram ; third place went to Brand Gucci with 21.0 Instagram ; fourth place went to Brand Roberto_Cavalli_Official with 4.4 Instagram and fifth place went to Brand Versace , who was 11.3 Instagram .
gold: The statistic illustrates the leading Italian fashion brands ranked by number of Instagram followers as of February 2018 . During the survey period in February 2018 , it was reported that Gucci ranked first with 21 million followers .
